org.apache.cassandra.metrics

Class EstimatedHistogramReservoir

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.cassandra.metrics.EstimatedHistogramReservoir
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    com.codahale.metrics.Reservoir

    public class EstimatedHistogramReservoir
extends java.lang.Object
implements com.codahale.metrics.Reservoir
    Allows our Histogram implementation to be used by the metrics library. Default buckets allows nanosecond timings.
